moves.name: Fell Stinger
moves.description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises sharply.

moves.name: Hydro Pump
moves.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

moves.name: Destiny Bond
moves.description: When this move is used, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints.

moves.name: Bubble
moves.description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets' Speed stats.

moves.name: Spikes
moves.description: The user lays a trap of spikes at the opposing team's feet. The trap hurts Pokémon that switch into battle.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Poison Sting
moves.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Harden
moves.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Minimize
moves.description: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

moves.name: Toxic Spikes
moves.description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the opponent's feet. They poison opponents that switch into battle.

moves.name: Stockpile
moves.description: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def. The move can be used three times.

moves.name: Spit Up
moves.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Revenge
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

moves.name: Brine
moves.description: If the target's HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.

moves.name: Pin Missile
moves.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Aqua Tail
moves.description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

moves.name: Poison Jab
moves.description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the target.

moves.name: Destiny Bond
moves.description: When this move is used, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints.

moves.name: Hydro Pump
moves.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

moves.name: Fell Stinger
moves.description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises sharply.
